Title: Wii Presenter
Description: Wii Presenter is a project that allows remote controlling of Powerpoint using the Wiimote. Also includes a built in zoom and panning utility.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Wii Presenter is a project that allows remote controlling of Powerpoint using the Wiimote. Also includes a built in zoom and panning utility.

For documentation, usage, support and more please see:
http://www.indyproject.org/WiiKey/
